nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two unsigned integers, reverts on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two unsigned integers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: add

nodes.documentation:
@dev Token contract
Used to transfer, transferFrom ERC-20 tokens
nodes.name: Token
onlyBy

nodes.documentation:
@dev Event to log the creation of an escrow
Logs the unique ID that is used to identify an escrow. Can be queried to obtain additional escrow details.
nodes.name: Creation
createEscrow
approveEscrow
cancelEscrow
raiseDispute

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "decision has to be in favor of depositer or receiver"

arguments.value: decision has to be in favor of depositer or receiver

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "decision has to be in favor of depositer or receiver"

nodes.name: resolveDispute

nodes.documentation:
@dev Destroys a contract
Temporary functionality.
nodes.name: killContract
